record.titleName: Research Institutes, Laboratory for Astrophysics and Space Research
record.alternateTitle1: Laboratory for Astrophysics and Space Research of the Enrico Fermi Institute for Nuclear Studies
record.description: [The 45,000 square-foot building contains space for laboratories and offices. Optical chemical, electrical, and mechanical laboratories for equipment design and development are housed in the basement. And, the sub-basement features a concrete shielded counting laboratory with decontamination rooms which are used for measuring radioactivity of meteorites, and moon and planet samples.]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
